data.title: DVD Collection
data.text:
Adam-12: Season One (1968)

Comment: As the box says, "the series that defined the police drama genre." True.

shill's feature Rating: 0/10.

Comment:

The Adventures of Brisco County, Jr: The Complete Series (1993)

Directed by Bryan Spicer, Greg Beeman, Andy Tennant.

Starring Bruce Campbell, Julius Carry, Christian Clemenson, Kelly Rutherford, John Astin, John Pyper-Ferguson, Billy Drago, Jeff Phillips.

Disc ratings: Picture /10. Extras /10.

Includes: Pilot, Socrates' Sister, The Orb Scholar, No Man's Land, Brisco in Jalisco, Riverboat, Pirates!, Senior Spirit, Brisco for the Defense, Showdown, Deep in the Heart of Dixie, Crystal Hawks, Steel Horses, Mail Order Brides, AKA Kansas, 12 more.

Comment: I can't believe this is already almost 15 years old. Seems like yesterday. All 27 episodes.

Starring Robert Newton, Connie Gilchrist, Kit Taylor, Billy Kay, Grant Taylor, Eric Reiman, John Brunskill, Harry Hambleton, John Sherwood.

Comment: First 13 episodes of the very fun pirate series with the best pirate ever, Robert Newton!

Includes: Too Many Earls, Blackmail, The Vandals, Dead Or Alive, The Fire, Brother Battle, Children of Greenwood, The Miser, Goodbye Little John, The May Queen, Queen Eleanor, Food For Thought

Comment: 12 random episodes of the Richard Greene series.

Starring Richard Greene, Alan Wheatley, Bernadette O'Farrell, Alexander Gauge, Archie Duncan, Ronald Howard, Victor Woolf, Jill Esmond, Ballard Berkeley, Gerald Cross, John Drake, Walter Hudd, Max Faulkner, Willoughby Gray, John Dearth, Patrick Troughton.

Comment: Four episodes of variable quality.

Starring William Russell, Jane Hylton, Ronald Leigh-Hunt, Cyril Smith, Peter Bennett, Robert Scroggins, Bruce Seton, David Morrell, Edwin Richfield, Brian Worth, Derren Nesbitt, Frederick Treves, Alfie Bass, Edward Judd, Carol Marsh, Robert Hardy.

Disc ratings: Picture 8/10. Extras /10.

Includes: The Knight With the Red Plume, The Ferocious Fathers, The Queen's Knight, The Outcase, Winged Victory, Sir Bliant, The Pirates, The Magic Sword, Lancelot's Banishment, The Roman Wall, Caledon, Theft of Excalibur, The Black Castle, 17 more.

Comment: This is a VERY fun show, the likes of which could never be made today. I love it.

The Adventures of Superman: Season One (1952)

Directed by Lee Sholem, Harry W Gerstad, Lew Landers.

Starring George Reeves, Phyllis Coates, Jack Larson, John Hamilton, Robert Shayne.

shill's feature Rating: 8/10.

Disc ratings: Picture /10. Extras /10.

Includes: Superman on Earth, The Haunted Lighthouse, The Case of the Talkative Dummy, Mystery of the Broken Statues, The Monkey Mystery, Night of Terror, The Birthday Letter, The Mind Machine, Rescue, 17 more plus "Superman vs the Mole Men" feature

Comment: Quite a lot of fun, but sometimes a bit too corny.

Starring George Reeves, Noel Neill, Jack Larson, John Hamilton, Robert Shayne.

shill's feature Rating: /10.

Comment: Quite a lot of fun, but sometimes a bit too corny. Noel Neill's an improvement.

Comment: The final two seasons of the Adventures of Superman. Corny fun.
